00027 
00037 complex double ssht_sampling_weight_mw(int p) {
00038 
00039   if (p == 1) {
00040     return I * SSHT_PION2;
00041   }
00042   else if (p == -1) {
00043      return - I * SSHT_PION2;
00044   }
00045   else if (p % 2 == 0) {
00046     return 2.0 / (1.0 - p*p);
00047   }
00048   else {
00049     return 0.0;
00050   }
00051   
00052 }
00053   
00054 
00065 double ssht_sampling_weight_dh(double theta_t, int L) {
00066 
00067   double w;
00068   int k;
00069 
00070   w = 0.0;
00071   for (k=0; k<=L-1; k++)
00072     w += sin((2.0*k+1.0)*theta_t) / (double)(2.0*k+1.0);
00073 
00074   w *= 2.0/((double) L) * sin(theta_t);
00075 
00076   return w;
00077 
00078 }

00094 void ssht_sampling_gl_thetas_weights(double *thetas, double *weights, int L) {
00095    
00096   int t;
00097   double tmp;
00098 
00099   gauleg(-1.0, 1.0, thetas, weights, L);
00100 
00101   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++)
00102     thetas[t] = acos(thetas[t]);
00103 
00104   // Reorder thetas array.
00105   for (t=0; t<=(L-1)/2; t++) {
00106     tmp = thetas[t];
00107     thetas[t] = thetas[L-1-t];
00108     thetas[L-1-t] = tmp;
00109   }
00110 
00111 }
00112 
00113 
00129 void gauleg(double x1, double x2, double *x, double *w, int n) {
00130 
00131   double EPS = 1e-14;
00132   int i,j,m;
00133   double p1,p2,p3,pp,xl,xm,z,z1;
00134 
00135   m=(n+1)/2;
00136   xm=0.5*(x2+x1);
00137   xl=0.5*(x2-x1);
00138 
00139   for (i=1; i<=m; i++) {
00140     z=cos(3.141592654*(i-.25)/(n+.5));
00141     do {
00142       p1=1.0;
00143       p2=0.0;
00144       for (j=1; j<=n; j++) {
00145         p3=p2;
00146         p2=p1;
00147         p1=((2.0*j-1.0)*z*p2-(j-1.0)*p3)/j;
00148       }
00149       pp=n*(z*p1-p2)/(z*z-1.0);
00150       z1=z;
00151       z=z1-p1/pp;
00152     } while (ABS(z-z1) > EPS);
00153     x[i-1]=xm-xl*z;
00154     x[n+1-i-1]=xm+xl*z;
00155     w[i-1]=2.0*xl/((1.0-z*z)*pp*pp);
00156     w[n+1-i-1]=w[i-1];
00157   }
00158 
00159 }

00197 double ssht_sampling_mw_t2theta(int t, int L) {
00198 
00199   return (2.0*t + 1.0) * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L - 1.0);
00200 
00201 }
00202

00212 int ssht_sampling_mw_nphi(int L) {
00213

00231 double ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(int p, int L) {
00232 
00233   return 2.0 * p * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L - 1.0);
00234 
00235 }

00249 int ssht_sampling_mw_n(int L) {
00250

00252

00269 double ssht_sampling_mw_ss_t2theta(int t, int L) {

00517 inline void ssht_sampling_elm2ind(int *ind, int el, int m) {
00518 
00519   *ind = el * el + el + m;
00520 
00521 }
00522 
00523 
00540 inline void ssht_sampling_ind2elm(int *el, int *m, int ind) {
00541 
00542   *el = sqrt(ind);
00543   *m = ind - (*el)*(*el) - (*el);
00544 
00545 }
